src:
Mau Tak Mau, Inter Milan Harus Kalahkan Barcelona
06 Nov 2019, 14:00 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Inter Milan menelan hasil pahit dalam lawatan ke kandang Borussia Dortmund pada matchday 4 Grup F Liga Champions 2019/20, Rabu (6/11/2019) dini hari WIB. Nerazzurri takluk 2-3 di hadapan The Great Yellow Wall of Borussia.
Kekalahan ini jelas menjadi pukulan berat bagi Inter. Mereka tertahan di peringkat ke-3 klasemen sementara Grup F dengan 4 poin dari 4 pertandingan, asa untuk lolos ke fase gugur kian tipis.
Saat ini, Barcelona masih memimpin klasemen sementara dengan 8 poin, lalu diikuti dengan Borussia Dortmund dengan 7 poin. Artinya, Inter harus menyapu bersih dua pertandingan berikutnya jika ingin lolos ke putaran berikutnya.

Baca selengkapnya di bawah ini ya, Bolaneters!
text:
Inevitably, Inter Milan Must Beat Barcelona
Nov 6 2019, 2:00 PM by Bola.net
Bola.net - Inter Milan swallowed bitter results on a trip to Borussia Dortmund on Matchday 4 Group F Champions League 2019/20, Wednesday (11/06/2019) early morning hrs. The Nerazzurri fell 2-3 before the Great Yellow Wall of Borussia.
This defeat is clearly a heavy blow for Inter. They are stuck in third place in Group F standings with 4 points from 4 matches, hopes to qualify for the knockout phase is getting thinner.
Currently, Barcelona still leads the standings with 8 points, followed by Borussia Dortmund with 7 points. That means Inter must clear the next two matches if they want to qualify for the next round.

Read below, Bolaneters!
